title: respond to aggression -- I with aistate7 in a norm game?
body: bit odd just wanted to know why i got 8 copies at once in chat bar twice in a game about 10 mins apart. Is someone scripting or is it a bug?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This issue has been reported and escalated to the appropriate team(s) to be dealt with.

We do not currently have an ETA on a fix.

Edit: A fix is on the way!
